resources.string: Sign in with the same email address you use for your GOV.UK One Login.
GOV.UK One Login is not available offline. Reconnect to the internet and try again
It looks like this phone does not have a passcode or pattern
Setting a passcode on your phone adds further security. You can then sign into the app this way instead of with your email address and password.
You can set a passcode later by going to your phone settings.
Sign in with your face or fingerprint instead of your email address and password. Your biometrics are not shared with GOV.UK One Login.
If you do not want to use biometrics, you can sign in with your phone passcode or pattern instead.
If you use biometrics, anyone with biometrics saved to your phone will be able to sign in to this app.
